content: week mary ellen s cowl pattern is an over-sized cowl with a chevron design this cowl has the added versatility that it can be worn down around the neck and up as a hood instructions include both written row by row instructions as well as a chart for chevron section finished measurements 30 circumference 14 high materials berroco comfort dk yarn 50% super fine nylon/50% super fine acrylic approximately 360 yards or 2 skeins needles size us 7 4 5 mm 24 circular needles or size to obtain gauge happy knitting
